author: Mark Molloy
title: Did Adele confirm she's married in tearful Grammys acceptance speech?
text:
Did Adele confirm she's married in tearful Grammys acceptance speech? Watch | Adele honours Beyonce's "Lemonade" in acceptance speech 00:41 Mark Molloy 13 February 2017 • 9:16am 
A dele appeared to confirm her marriage to long-term partner Simon Koneckiin during an emotional acceptance speech at the Grammys. 
Reports suggested she had secretly tied the knot earlier this month, with the 28-year-old thanking her ‘husband’ on stage as she accepted her album of the year award. Adele breaks the Grammy for Record of the Year Credit: Reuters 
“I appreciate it, the Academy, I love you, my manager, my husband and my son - you're the only reason I do it,” she said. 
S he also paid tribute to her ‘idol’ Beyoncé, who missed out on the top album award with her record Lemonade. 
“I can't possibly accept this award,” she said. 
“I'm very humble and I'm grateful and gracious but my artist of my life is Beyoncé and the Lemonade album was just so monumental - Beyoncé, it was so monumental - and so well thought out and so beautiful and soul-bearing.” Adele poses in the press room with her trophies Credit: AFP / Getty 
S he told a tearful Beyoncé: “All us artists here, we f g adore you. 
“The way you make me and my friends feel. The way you make my black friends feel is empowering. You make them stand up for themselves and I love you and I always have.” 
“My idol is Queen Bey and I adore you.” 
A dele also spoke about being pregnant at the 2012 Grammys: “In my pregnancy and through becoming a mother, I lost a lot of myself," she said. 
“I struggled and I still do struggle being a mum. It's really hard. 
“But tonight, winning this kind of feels full circle and a bit of me has come back to myself.”
